title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 643 - Executory Contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 643 - Executory Contracts

State Regulations
§ 643.1 - Executory contracts as mortgages
§ 643.2 - Computation of taxes due in the case of a taxable executory contract

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 643

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
